mapper.select: select to_char(d.DOCK_STIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') dockTime from t_car c,t_dock d where c.car_id=d.car_id and d.dock_state=1 and c.car_id=#{0}
select to_char(DOCK_STIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') "dockSTime",park_id "parkId" from t_dock where dock_state=1 and car_id=#{carId}
mapper.update: update t_dock set dock_etime=sysdate,dock_state=#{dockState} where car_id=#{carId} and dock_state=1
